title: FastStore - August, 2022
description: Gift, OrderSummary, SkuSelector, and CartItem components are now available in the FastStore UI. Also, update to the FastStore API improves the shopping cart UX and allow adding user's session information to the orderForm.

title: Preview deploys are now on GitHub environments
description: The automatic previews of your FastStore project's pull requests are now deployed with GitHub environments.

title: New and improved FastStore API guides
description: There are new and improved FastStore API guides available on our documentation portal.

title: FastStore - July, 2022
description: The search query has been enhanced to allow cross-selling and upselling of products. Also, the new subscribeToNewsletter mutation is now available in the FastStore API.
